name: Mahfujul Haque Plabon
comment: I ordered 1 higher end laptops for Eid gifts nearly 1 months ahead of time. But HP saying that ,  arrive in early Aprial .

name: Rifat jahan zim
comment: Computer just shuts down in the middle of typing. I send emails from another computer. Sometimes it will be hours before the message makes it to my computer.

name: Bariul Munsi
comment: I have Purchased HP Laptop on 14.02.2021 of 11th Generation but it runs like a 1st generation. No proper action to resolve customer issues is taken and they are waiting only for Warranty period ending.

name: Anik Ahmed
comment: I am satisfied to get the product. Continue business with honesty.
